snippet.title: The Black Death - Relics Trailer (PC)
snippet.description:
Buy the Black Death today:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/412450/The_Black_Death/
https://www.greenmangaming.com/games/the-black-death/

Relics is the latest update to the medieval survival game, The Black Death. Each server will have a unique item for one player to find and try to keep hold of - but be warned, everyone else will be after it, too...

With new areas to loot, totally rebuilt combat system and gore galore, The Black Death just got a whole lot bigger.

The Black Death is a dark multiplayer survival game set during a plague-ridden medieval era.

Green Man Gaming Publishing - publisher of fine independent PC games. Games such as Aporia: Beyond The Valley, Stormworks: Build and Rescue, The Black Death, Stable Orbit, and much more.
